message.content:
I need to identify the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period based on the financial statement provided.

Looking at the income statement, I can see a line item "Cost of Goods Sold" which typically represents the carrying amount of inventories that were sold during the period.

In the income statement, I can see:
| Account | Amount | Date |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Cost of Goods Sold | 496220.00 | 2024-02-02 |

This represents the value of inventory that was sold during the reporting period. The carrying amount of inventories sold is therefore 496220.00.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '496220.00'} }
```
